    About


    Currently managing mobile products @Jabong. Ex @Paytm @Zomato.

I have had experience with design and development of Ad Networks, Payment Systems, E-commerce/M-commerce websites, Fashion websites, DWH/DWA systems, Mobile applications and API platforms. Looking to work on new age products that use technology to solve problems.
